definitions.text: that which is deserved or owed
a payment that is due (e.g., as the price of membership)
examples: the society dropped him for non-payment of dues

definitions.text: owed and payable immediately or on demand

examples: the train is due in 15 minutes

definitions.text: suitable to or expected in the circumstances
capable of being assigned or credited to
examples: punctuation errors ascribable to careless proofreading
the cancellation of the concert was due to the rain
the oversight was not imputable to him
